item.description:
Personal Finace 101

Time and Place Date: Thursday, October 2, 2008
Time: 6:00pm - 9:00pm
Location: 33 Restaurant & Lounge
Street: Stanhope St
City/Town: Boston, MA

Event Description:

Personal Finance 101

The economy is crazy right now.

How will it affect you?

How difficult is it to plan for a comfortable future?

What are the first steps we can take to take control of our finances and not let our finances control us?

Please join us on Oct. 2 as top financial adviser Delores King, CFP, answers these questions and more as she walks us through the basics of personal finance and gives tips on how to protect ourselves financially through this economic storm.

Dolores was named one of the Top 10 Financial Advisers by Women's Business Boston.

She also hosts her own personal finance radio show, "Dollars & Sense with Dolores Kong," and was an award-nominated financial reporter at The Boston Globe.
item.name: Personal Finance 101
